title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
description: Conception et déploiement d'architectures cloud scalables, sécurisées et résilientes sur AWS. Maîtrise des services EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, VPC, IAM et CloudFormation.

title: Google Professional Cloud Architect
description: Conception d'infrastructures cloud natives sur Google Cloud Platform. Expertise en Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, BigQuery, Kubernetes Engine et Cloud Functions.

title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
description: Architecture de solutions cloud sur Azure. Compétences en Azure App Services, Azure Functions, Cosmos DB, Azure DevOps et Azure Active Directory.

title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
description: Administration de clusters Kubernetes en production. Gestion des deployments, networking, storage, security et troubleshooting.

title: HashiCorp Certified: Terraform Associate
description: Infrastructure as Code avec Terraform. Maîtrise des providers, modules, state management et best practices pour provisionner des infrastructures cloud.
